cards.name: The Mimeoplasm
cards.text: As The Mimeoplasm enters the battlefield, you may exile two creature cards from graveyards. If you do, it enters the battlefield as a copy of one of those cards with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the power of the other card.

cards.flavor: Ask your query and be on your way. Just don't look her in the eye.
cards.name: Damia, Sage of Stone
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Skip your draw step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.

cards.name: Vorosh, the Hunter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Vorosh, the Hunter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, put six +1/+1 counters on Vorosh.

cards.name: Daretti, Scrap Savant
cards.text:
+2: Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.
−2: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
−10: You get an emblem with "Whenever an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step."
Daretti, Scrap Savant can be your commander.

cards.flavor: As Glissa searches for the truth about Memnarch, Bosh searches to unearth the secrets of his past.
cards.name: Bosh, Iron Golem
cards.text:
Trample
{3}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Bosh, Iron Golem deals damage equal to the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost to any target.

cards.flavor: "She will come back to me."
cards.name: Feldon of the Third Path
cards.text: {2}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card in your graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Kalemne, Disciple of Iroas
cards.text:
Double strike, vigilance
Whenever you cast a creature spell with converted mana cost 5 or greater, you get an experience counter.
Kalemne, Disciple of Iroas gets +1/+1 for each experience counter you have.

cards.name: Anya, Merciless Angel
cards.text:
Flying
Anya, Merciless Angel gets +3/+3 for each opponent whose life total is less than half their starting life total.
As long as an opponent's life total is less than half their starting life total, Anya has indestructible.

cards.name: Gisela, Blade of Goldnight
cards.text:
Flying, first strike
If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead.
If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

cards.name: Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance, deathtouch, lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

cards.flavor: "Now the scaled ones rule Tarkir."
cards.name: Ikra Shidiqi, the Usurper
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

cards.flavor: "Through me, the Great Teacher's voice will rattle this world."
cards.name: Ishai, Ojutai Dragonspeaker
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ishai, Ojutai Dragonspeaker.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

cards.name: Reyhan, Last of the Abzan
cards.text:
Reyhan, Last of the Abzan enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever a creature you control dies or is put into the command zone, if it had one or more +1/+1 counters on it, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

cards.name: Artisan of Kozilek
cards.text:
When you cast this spell, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

cards.flavor: The fastest way across the dunes is above.
cards.name: Abzan Falconer
cards.text:
Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

cards.name: Angel of Serenity
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.
When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

cards.flavor: Though giants are mortal, they live so long and on such a grand scale that many small folk don't believe they ever truly die.
cards.name: Arbiter of Knollridge
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Arbiter of Knollridge enters the battlefield, each player's life total becomes the highest life total among all players.

cards.name: Banishing Light
cards.text: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield. (That permanent returns under its owner's control.)

cards.flavor: Enduring the most desolate and dangerous conditions, Abzan sentries unfailingly guard the stronghold gates.
cards.name: Brave the Sands
cards.text:
Creatures you control have vigilance.
Each creature you control can block an additional creature each combat.

cards.flavor: Avacyn's holy warriors kept hope alive in her darkest hours. Now they will carry that hope across Innistrad.
cards.name: Cathars' Crusade
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

cards.name: Citadel Siege
cards.text:
As Citadel Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of combat on your turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
• Dragons — At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.

cards.name: Crib Swap
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.

cards.name: Custodi Soulbinders
cards.text:
Custodi Soulbinders enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield.
{2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Custodi Soulbinders: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: Dawnbreak Reclaimer
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, choose a creature card in an opponent's graveyard, then that player chooses a creature card in your graveyard. You may return those cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

cards.flavor:
"What we knew as Emeria, Ula, and Cosi were not divine beings at all, but a cruel trick, and a grave error."
—The Invokers' Tales
cards.name: Dawnglare Invoker
cards.text:
Flying
{8}: Tap all creatures target player controls.

cards.flavor: The best techniques outlive their creators.
cards.name: Duelist's Heritage
cards.text: Whenever one or more creatures attack, you may have target attacking creature gain double strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Elite Scaleguard
cards.text:
When Elite Scaleguard enters the battlefield, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

cards.name: Faith's Fetters
cards.text:
Enchant permanent
When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

cards.name: Herald of the Host
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

cards.flavor: Light's champion in the stronghold of darkness.
cards.name: Jareth, Leonine Titan
cards.text:
Whenever Jareth, Leonine Titan blocks, it gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
{W}: Jareth gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

cards.name: Kalemne's Captain
cards.text:
Vigilance
{5}{W}{W}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Kalemne's Captain becomes monstrous, exile all artifacts and enchantments.

cards.name: Oreskos Explorer
cards.text: When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Orim's Thunder
cards.text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's converted mana cost to target creature.

cards.flavor: The Orzhov care not for repentance, only repayment.
cards.name: Orzhov Advokist
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or a planeswalker you control until your next turn.

cards.name: Reveillark
cards.text:
Flying
When Reveillark leaves the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Evoke {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.flavor: Exhale, and let the winds carry your soul for all eternity.
cards.name: Sublime Exhalation
cards.text:
Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)
Destroy all creatures.

cards.flavor: A blazing sun that never sets.
cards.name: Sun Titan
cards.text:
Vigilance
Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor: The corruption stirred the heavens above, awaking a shining champion.
cards.name: Victory's Herald
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Victory's Herald attacks, attacking creatures gain flying and lifelink until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Its graceful glide paints the ocean floor with strokes of luminescence.
cards.name: Deepglow Skate
cards.text: When Deepglow Skate enters the battlefield, double the number of each kind of counter on any number of target permanents.

cards.flavor: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."
cards.name: Disdainful Stroke
cards.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

cards.flavor:
"Her voice is insight, piercing and true."
—Ixidor, reality sculptor
cards.name: Dreamborn Muse
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard, where X is the number of cards in their hand.

cards.flavor: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."
cards.name: Fact or Fiction
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.flavor:
"Even your blade knows who will triumph here."
—Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
cards.name: Grip of Phyresis
cards.text: Gain control of target Equipment, then create a 0/0 black Germ creature token and attach that Equipment to it.

cards.name: Manifold Insights
cards.text: Reveal the top ten cards of your library. Starting with the next opponent in turn order, each opponent chooses a different nonland card from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor:
"The Filigree Texts do not compel you to act in accordance with their precepts. They only specify the consequences should you fail."
—Lodus of the Ethersworn
cards.name: Memory Erosion
cards.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

cards.name: Minds Aglow
cards.text: Join forces — Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player draws X cards, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.

cards.name: Mulldrifter
cards.text:
Flying
When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.flavor: Fools surrender their sanity to his riddles. Even greater fools try to solve them.
cards.name: Riddlekeeper
cards.text: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

cards.flavor: "It's a fine way to travel, if you don't mind the smell."
cards.name: Slipstream Eel
cards.text:
Slipstream Eel can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Spell Crumple
cards.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard. Put Spell Crumple on the bottom of its owner's library.

cards.name: Tezzeret's Gambit
cards.text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
Draw two cards, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

cards.name: Thrummingbird
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Thrummingbird deals combat damage to a player, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

cards.flavor: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.
cards.name: Treasure Cruise
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.

cards.flavor:
"Soaring is wasted on the winged."
—Edric, Spymaster of Trest
cards.name: Vow of Flight
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and can't attack you or a planeswalker you control.

cards.flavor:
"To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it."
—Barrin, master wizard
cards.name: Windfall
cards.text: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

cards.flavor:
"The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air."
—Scroll of Beginnings
cards.name: Wonder
cards.text:
Flying
As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.

cards.name: Avatar of Woe
cards.text:
If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, this spell costs {6} less to cast.
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Bane of the Living
cards.text:
Morph {X}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Bane of the Living is turned face up, all creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The scrape of shovels and the tumble of cold dirt soon muffled their pleas.
cards.name: Buried Alive
cards.text: Search your library for up to three creature cards and put them into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.
cards.name: Butcher of Malakir
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

cards.name: Dark Hatchling
cards.text:
Flying
When Dark Hatchling enters the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Extractor Demon
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever another creature leaves the battlefield, you may have target player put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: A single festercreep isn't alone. It's already an infestation.
cards.name: Festercreep
cards.text:
Festercreep enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Festercreep: All other creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.
cards.name: Fleshbag Marauder
cards.text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

cards.flavor:
"The bonds of loyalty can tie one to the grave."
—Crovax, ascendant evincar
cards.name: Grave Pact
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

cards.flavor: Only a thin layer of dirt separates civilization from an undead apocalypse.
cards.name: Gravedigger
cards.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: Life is such a fragile thing.
cards.name: Languish
cards.text: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.

cards.name: Living Death
cards.text: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: The light sigh of its breath whistles through its bones.
cards.name: Mortivore
cards.text:
Mortivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
{B}: Regenerate Mortivore.

cards.name: Necroplasm
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Necroplasm.
At the beginning of your end step, destroy each creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Necroplasm.
Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

cards.name: Nezumi Graverobber
cards.text: {1}{B}: Exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If no cards are in that graveyard, flip Nezumi Graverobber.

cards.name: Nighteyes the Desecrator
cards.text: {4}{B}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Patron of the Nezumi
cards.text:
Rat offering (You may cast this card any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a Rat and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Rat. Mana cost includes color.)
Whenever a permanent is put into an opponent's graveyard, that player loses 1 life.

cards.flavor:
"Death is no excuse for disobedience."
—Liliana Vess
cards.name: Rise from the Grave
cards.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

cards.name: Scythe Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Scythe Specter deals combat damage to a player, each opponent discards a card. Each player who discarded a card with the highest converted mana cost among cards discarded this way loses life equal to that converted mana cost.

cards.name: Sewer Nemesis
cards.text:
As Sewer Nemesis enters the battlefield, choose a player.
Sewer Nemesis's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the chosen player's graveyard.
Whenever the chosen player casts a spell, that player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

cards.name: Shared Trauma
cards.text: Join forces — Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.

cards.flavor: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.
cards.name: Sign in Blood
cards.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

cards.name: Stitch Together
cards.text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Threshold — Return that card from your graveyard to the battlefield instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: Necromancers deal in commodities far more precious than gold and grain.
cards.name: Syphon Flesh
cards.text: Each other player sacrifices a creature. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.

cards.flavor: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.
cards.name: Syphon Mind
cards.text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.

cards.flavor:
"If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me."
—Xantcha, to Gix
cards.name: Unnerve
cards.text: Each opponent discards two cards.

cards.flavor:
"I grant you blades—on the condition that they are not pointed at me."
—Damia, Sage of Stone
cards.name: Vow of Malice
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has intimidate, and can't attack you or a planeswalker you control. (A creature with intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

cards.flavor: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.
cards.name: Beetleback Chief
cards.text: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

cards.name: Bitter Feud
cards.text:
As Bitter Feud enters the battlefield, choose two players.
If a source controlled by one of the chosen players would deal damage to the other chosen player or a permanent that player controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead.

cards.flavor:
"Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar
cards.name: Blasphemous Act
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

cards.name: Bogardan Hellkite
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

cards.flavor: Giants share nothing but their fury.
cards.name: Borderland Behemoth
cards.text:
Trample
Borderland Behemoth gets +4/+4 for each other Giant you control.

cards.name: Breath of Darigaaz
cards.text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

cards.name: Chaos Warp
cards.text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: When the moon rises and the bloodlust takes hold, nothing matters but the kill.
cards.name: Curse of the Nightly Hunt
cards.text:
Enchant player
Creatures enchanted player controls attack each combat if able.

cards.name: Desolation Giant
cards.text:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)
When Desolation Giant enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead.

cards.name: Disaster Radius
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand.
Disaster Radius deals X damage to each creature your opponents control, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.

cards.flavor: Its wings shimmer with dreams absorbed from its enemies.
cards.name: Dream Pillager
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Dream Pillager deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast nonland cards from among those exiled cards.

cards.flavor: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."
cards.name: Dualcaster Mage
cards.text:
Flash
When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.flavor: They fell screaming into the depths of the chasm like so many pebbles tossed down a well.
cards.name: Earthquake
cards.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

cards.flavor: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"
cards.name: Faithless Looting
cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: It is unwise to insult the god of the forge. It is also unwise to stand near anyone else who has insulted him.
cards.name: Fall of the Hammer
cards.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.

cards.name: Fiery Confluence
cards.text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Fiery Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature.
• Fiery Confluence deals 2 damage to each opponent.
• Destroy target artifact.

cards.flavor:
"For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim."
—Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight
cards.name: Flametongue Kavu
cards.text: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

cards.name: Fumiko the Lowblood
cards.text:
Fumiko the Lowblood has bushido X, where X is the number of attacking creatures. (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +X/+X until end of turn.)
Creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.

cards.flavor: "I wrecked your metal guy, boss. But look! I made you an ashtray."
cards.name: Goblin Welder
cards.text: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"If you live on a giant's back, there's only one individual you'll ever need to fear."
—Gaddock Teeg
cards.name: Hamletback Goliath
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Hamletback Goliath, where X is that creature's power.

cards.flavor:
"Oh sure, they buy a lot of ale, but I always find myself needing to rebuild after the giants have paid a visit."
—Belko, owner of Titan's Keg tavern
cards.name: Hammerfist Giant
cards.text: {T}: Hammerfist Giant deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player.

cards.flavor: He collects the precious metals, and then converts the rest to propellant.
cards.name: Hoard-Smelter Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
{3}{R}: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.

cards.name: Hostility
cards.text:
Haste
If a spell you control would deal damage to an opponent, prevent that damage. Create a 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature token with haste for each 1 damage prevented this way.
When Hostility is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.flavor: The knights see a mighty quarry. The dragon sees breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
cards.name: Hunted Dragon
cards.text:
Flying, haste
When Hunted Dragon enters the battlefield, target opponent creates three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with first strike.

cards.name: Impact Resonance
cards.text: Impact Resonance deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the greatest amount of damage dealt by a source to a permanent or player this turn.

cards.flavor: Nothing breaks the monotony like a good old-fashioned riot.
cards.name: Incite Rebellion
cards.text: For each player, Incite Rebellion deals damage to that player and each creature that player controls equal to the number of creatures they control.

cards.name: Inferno Titan
cards.text:
{R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

cards.flavor: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."
cards.name: Ingot Chewer
cards.text:
When Ingot Chewer enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.flavor: Its open mouth is a furnace blast that blisters the skin. Its smoking fists are meteors that split the earth.
cards.name: Magma Giant
cards.text: When Magma Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

cards.flavor:
"Where will you run when I punish you with the very ground you flee on?"
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Magmaquake
cards.text: Magmaquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker.

cards.flavor: "Fate is not as fixed as you might think."
cards.name: Magus of the Wheel
cards.text: {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Wheel: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.

cards.flavor:
"Behold astronomy's contribution to war."
—Fennor Rhyl, starcaller
cards.name: Meteor Blast
cards.text: Meteor Blast deals 4 damage to each of X targets.

cards.name: Rite of the Raging Storm
cards.text:
Creatures named Lightning Rager can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player creates a 5/1 red Elemental creature token named Lightning Rager. It has trample, haste, and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this creature."

cards.flavor: "Where a lesser mind sees junk, I see infinite potential."
cards.name: Scrap Mastery
cards.text: Each player exiles all artifact cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all artifacts they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Disaster stalks with gaping jaws across unready lands.
cards.name: Spitebellows
cards.text:
When Spitebellows leaves the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to target creature.
Evoke {1}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.flavor: Ever since the disaster, the city's survivors viewed the star-strewn sky with dread.
cards.name: Starstorm
cards.text:
Starstorm deals X damage to each creature.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.flavor: Boggarts constantly strive to outdo each other with the things they bring back to the warren, each hoping the exploit will become as well-known as those of Auntie Grub.
cards.name: Stinkdrinker Daredevil
cards.text: Giant spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

cards.name: Stoneshock Giant
cards.text:
{6}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Stoneshock Giant becomes monstrous, creatures without flying your opponents control can't block this turn.

cards.flavor: A hundred generations has he mentored, a hundred armies has he crushed beneath his feet, yet only a hundred words has he ever spoken, each more revered than a hundred books.
cards.name: Sunrise Sovereign
cards.text: Other Giant creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample.

cards.flavor: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.
cards.name: Taurean Mauler
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.

cards.flavor: He cares not for the disasters his storm brings as long as his path ahead is clear.
cards.name: Thundercloud Shaman
cards.text: When Thundercloud Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to the number of Giants you control to each non-Giant creature.

cards.flavor: Remade by Eldrazi magic, Tuktuk inspired an entire clan of misguided goblins.
cards.name: Tuktuk the Explorer
cards.text:
Haste
When Tuktuk the Explorer dies, create a legendary 5/5 colorless Goblin Golem artifact creature token named Tuktuk the Returned.

cards.flavor: Nothing escapes its gaze—or its breath.
cards.name: Tyrant's Familiar
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Lieutenant — As long as you control your commander, Tyrant's Familiar gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever Tyrant's Familiar attacks, it deals 7 damage to target creature defending player controls."

cards.name: Volcanic Offering
cards.text:
Destroy target nonbasic land you don't control and target nonbasic land of an opponent's choice you don't control.
Volcanic Offering deals 7 damage to target creature you don't control and 7 damage to target creature of an opponent's choice you don't control.

cards.name: Warchief Giant
cards.text:
Haste
Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

cards.flavor: Its wings beat to the howls of war and fan the fires of rage.
cards.name: Warmonger Hellkite
cards.text:
Flying
All creatures attack each combat if able.
{1}{R}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Listen to the roar! Feel the thunder! The Immersturm shouts its approval with every bolt of lightning!"
cards.name: Warstorm Surge
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

cards.flavor: The slag-workers wasted no time in creating their own flare pulses to cleanse the area of the incompleat.
cards.name: Whipflare
cards.text: Whipflare deals 2 damage to each nonartifact creature.

cards.flavor: "Obey!"
cards.name: Word of Seizing
cards.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Untap target permanent and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Acidic Slime
cards.text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

cards.flavor:
"'I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered."
—Scroll of Beginnings
cards.name: Brawn
cards.text:
Trample
As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.

cards.name: Champion of Lambholt
cards.text:
Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

cards.flavor: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.
cards.name: Cultivate
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.
cards.name: Eternal Witness
cards.text: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.
cards.name: Forgotten Ancient
cards.text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

cards.flavor:
"Naga shed their scales. We wear ours with pride."
—Golran, dragonscale captain
cards.name: Hardened Scales
cards.text: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

cards.name: Inspiring Call
cards.text: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Even baloths fear its feeding time.
cards.name: Kalonian Hydra
cards.text:
Trample
Kalonian Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Kalonian Hydra attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

cards.flavor:
"Ach! Hans, run! It's the lhurgoyf!"
—Saffi Eriksdotter, last words
cards.name: Lhurgoyf
cards.text: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

cards.flavor: There are many ruins, but there used to be many more.

cards.flavor: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

cards.text: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Solidarity of Heroes

Strive — This spell costs {1}{G} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

cards.flavor:
"You may enter, but leave those lifeless things of your world behind."
—Modruni, maro-sorcerer
cards.name: Tribute to the Wild
cards.text: Each opponent sacrifices an artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: It's no coincidence that the oldest trolls are also the angriest.

cards.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{1}{G}: Regenerate Troll Ascetic.

cards.flavor: One quiet word sets off the stampede.

cards.text:
Outlast {G} ({G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

cards.flavor:
"Savagery is the birthright of every creature that draws breath—or wishes it could."
—Karador, Ghost Chieftain
cards.name: Vow of Wildness
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, has trample, and can't attack you or a planeswalker you control.

cards.name: Yavimaya Elder

When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: Some see the world as a place of infinite wonder and knowledge. Some see it as an infinite dinner plate.

cards.flavor: Weakness is not in the nature of the Swarm.

cards.flavor: Loose earth is not a burial but an appetizer.

cards.text: When Desecrator Hag enters the battlefield, return to your hand the creature card in your graveyard with the greatest power. If two or more cards are tied for greatest power, you choose one of them.

cards.flavor: The Abzan turn to this spell only as a last resort, for its inevitable result is what they most dread: to be alone.
cards.name: Duneblast

cards.flavor: Only the sun that beats down upon Arashin's walls could shine more brightly.

Flying

cards.flavor: Many who cross Sorin's path come down with a sudden and fatal case of being-in-the-way-of-a-millennia-old-vampire.

cards.flavor:
